lead_paragraph: EMMETT--Carolyn C. Passed away on March 12, 2016 at age 75. A renowned Poet, Editor and Author, she is survived by her loving sister Arlen. Carolyn began writing and reading her poetry in the 1950's in New York City. Throughout her career she was an Editor, taught poetry workshops, and helped form The Rockland Poets. She authored and published over 70 poems including her book titled I HAD A WORLD. A social activist and animal lover, her beautiful spirit will live with us in the gift of her poetry. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  EMMETT, CAROLYN C

She authored and published over 70 poems including her book titled I HAD A WORLD. A social activist and animal lover, her beautiful spirit will live with us in the gift of her poetry. 1/3
